titleStmt.title: Dixon Clark and E. H. Logan
CWG8047

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
Morehead Rowan County Ky
August 6th 1863
Hon J. F Robinson
Sir

Owing to the troubles in our County there has been no election either in may last or in this month for the election of Justices of the peace in two districts in our County We therefore recommend Fielding Alfrey, & John W Ellington in district No 1 Jas A. Kirk & George B Cassity for District No 2,. to serve until the next election.

Yours Respectfully
Dixon Clark P Judge C C
E H Logan clK

Rowan Co
J. P.
Issd Aug 18 1863
